title: Tabs are just one long Tab I HATE IT; I can' seethem
content:
Please Please Please Stop messing with my tabs. I now have a great big bar tab and I can barely see the info on the tabs. WTF Firefox? I was able to do a workaround in FF 89, but that doesn't work in the update of 91

Please, Please, Please give me a workaround to get back to old fashioned tabs, with separations between them and a black background so I can read the printing.

Thank you
creator: kathyjoe5
